body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Kenneth White and the customer's name is Sharon Ramirez.  The conversation is about Happy Animal Shelter (a Animal Shelter ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling ABC Services. My name is Emily. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I have some questions about my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course. I'd be happy to help. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Doe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. To ensure we have the correct information, could you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my date of birth is January 15, 1985.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Could you also provide me with the last four digits of your social security number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The last four digits are one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. Thanks so much for that information, John. I have everything I need to proceed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today. If you have any more questions, feel free to call us back. Have a wonderful day!
